Overview For ghostGLUTManager Members Chapter

ghostGLUTManager

ghostGLUTManager( const ghostGLUTManager& rhs_ ) ;

Disabled copy constructor. This constructor is declared private but not defined to keep the compiler from generating a copy constructor and to make it impossible create an instance of this class using the copy constructor.

Any attempt by code outside of this class to access (either explicitly or implicitly) the copy constructor for this class will result in a compiler error because the constructor is declared private. An attempt to access the copy constructor from within this class will compile but will fail at link time because the constructor is not defined.

rhs_
Existing object being copied.
